title: [Neuroscience] Adding to the growing body of evidence on sleep disturbances and cognitive impairment, new research finds significant links between three measures of sleep disturbance and the risk for developing dementia over a 10-year period

[Health] A meta-analysis finds that compared with controls, individuals with generalized anxiety disorder (GAD), major depressive disorder (MDD), and panic disorder (PD) exhibit significantly reduced heart rate variability
